00004 void print_directory(fs_node_t* node, int recur) {
00005 
00006     printf("Listing directory %s", node->name);
00007     printf(" Length %i\n", node->length);
00008 
00009     struct dirent* ent = 0;
00010 
00011     uint32 iter = 0; 
00012     while (1) {
00013 
00014         ent = readdir_fs(node, iter);
00015 
00016         if (ent == 0) {
00017                 break;  
00018         }
00019 
00020         fs_node_t* nent = finddir_fs(node, ent->name);
00021 
00022 
00023         if (!is_directory(nent)) {
00024 
00025                 printf("File %s Length %i\n", ent->name, nent->length);
00026                 free(ent);
00027

00029 
00030                 if (strcmp(ent->name, ".") == 0)
00031                 {
00032                 }
00033                 else if (strcmp(ent->name, "..") == 0)
00034                 {
00035                 }
00036                 else if (recur == 1) {
00037                         print_directory(nent, 1);
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 free(ent);
00041         }
00042 
00043         iter++;
00044     }
00045
